content: triss baby blanket crepleknits size 80x100 cm needles 3 5 mm gauge 19 stitches x 28 row = 10cm x 10cm materials 500g of yarn 200g in colour a 100g in colour b and 200g in colour c suggested yarn the cotton we are knitters 200g in light grey a 100g in copper b 200g in khaki c © crepleknits | agnieszka wojtkowiak| 2020 1 notes abbrevations trissbaby blanket is an easy knit & purl pattern knitted in row in three yarn colours k knit p purl colours pattern co cast on 17 16 st s stitch es 15 14 13 12 11 10 9 direction of knitting 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 © crepleknits | agnieszka wojtkowiak | 2020 2 pattern row 13 p all sts row 14 p8 co149 sts with colour a *k5 p11* -repeat 8 times k5 p8 purl the first 3 and the last 3 sts on every row row 15 p all sts row 1-3 p all sts row 16 p9 row 4 p3 k15 *k3 p13* -repeat 8 times *p1 k15* -repeat 8 times k3 p9 p3 row 17 p all sts row 5 p all sts row 18 p10 row 6 p4 *k1 p15* repeat 8 times *k13 p3* -repat 8 times k1 p10 k 13 p4 switch to yarn colour b row 7 p all sts row 19 p all sts row 8 p5 *k11 p5* -repeat 8 times row 20 p3 k7 k11 p5 *p1 k15* -repeat 8 times p1 k7 p3 row 9 p all sts row 21 p all sts row 10 p6 *k9 p7* -repeat 8 times row 22 p3 k6 k9 p6 *p3 k13* -repeat 8 times p3 k6 p3 row 11 p all sts row 23 p all sts row 12 p7 *k7 p9* -repeat 8 times k7 p7 © crepleknits | agnieszka wojtkowiak | 2020 3 row 24 p3 k5 switch to yarn coloura *p5 k11* -repeat 8 times p5 k5 p3 row 35-50 repeat row 3-18 row 25 p all sts switch to yarn colourc row 26 p3 k4 row 51-66 repeat row 19-34 *p7 k9* -repeat 8 times p7 k4 p3 switch to yarn colour b row 27 p all sts row 67-82 repeat row 3-18 row 28 p3 k3 switch to yarn colourc *p9 k7* -repeat 8 times p9 k3 p3 row 83-98 repeat row 19-34 row 29 p all sts switch to yarn coloura row 30 p3 k2 row 99-114 repeat row 3-18 *p11 k5* -repeat 8 times p11 k2 p3 switch to yarn colourc row 31 p all sts row 115-130 repeat row 19-34 row 32 p3 k1 switch to yarn coloura *p13 k3 -repeat 8 times p13 k1 p3 row 131-146 repeat row 3-18 row 33 p all sts switch to yarn colour b row 34 p18 row 147-162 repeat row 19-34 *k1 p15* -repeat 8 times p3 © crepleknits | agnieszka wojtkowiak | 2020 4 switch to yarn coloura row 163-178 repeat row 3-18
